modules.title: Prompt Engineering
modules.description: Master the art of writing effective prompts for AI models

lessons.title: Prompt Types
lessons.content:
**Zero-Shot Prompts:**
â€¢ No examples provided
â€¢ Model uses general knowledge
â€¢ Good for simple tasks
â€¢ May lack specificity
â€¢ Quick to write

**Few-Shot Prompts:**
â€¢ Include examples
â€¢ Show desired format
â€¢ Improve accuracy
â€¢ Reduce errors
â€¢ More effective

**Chain-of-Thought:**
â€¢ Step-by-step reasoning
â€¢ Show thinking process
â€¢ Better for complex tasks
â€¢ Reduces errors
â€¢ More reliable

**Role-Based Prompts:**
â€¢ Define AI's role
â€¢ Set expectations
â€¢ Improve consistency
â€¢ Better results
â€¢ Clear boundaries
